Text: There’s no shortage of waiters around here. Crap.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan, back this way.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Alley oop. Shh shh shh shh…

Speaker: Nate
Text: You shh shh shh…

Speaker: Sam
Text: Finally. Shit. Guards. Fresh air, here we come… Hey, check this out. See that building with the radio tower?

Speaker: Nate
Text: You mean the cell tower?

Speaker: Sam
Text: The what? Whatever. Listen, that’s the power room.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, you’re right. Let’s see how we get past the gate.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Hey Nathan, check it out.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Sam, up here. I’ll boost you up. Good thing you kept in shape.

Speaker: Sam
Text: There ya go.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Sully, we just got out of the wine cellar. Heading to the power room now. How’s it looking? Sully…? You there? It must be a bad spot for a signal. Hopefully he’s doing okay.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Bingo. Found the kitchen. And of course, it’s locked.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Sam, look, maybe we can use that, find a window, drop into the kitchen.

Speaker: Sam
Text: That’s a good idea. I’ll boost you up and you take care of the ladder. Got it?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Heads up, heads up. Buonasera. (Good evening.]

Speaker: Waiter
Text: Che sta facendo? (What is you doing?]
[Sam knocks him out.]

Speaker: Nate
Text: Easy on the civilians, Sam.

Speaker: Sam
Text: What? So he wakes up with a headache in his underwear. We’ve both been there before, right?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Heh. Right…

Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, I got mine. You get yours.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay. Let’s get to the power room. Sam, you good?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Yeah, these pants are just a little bit too tight.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, that’s the style these days.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Really? Well, when in Rome…

Speaker: Nate
Text: Ha. ‘Cause we’re in Italy. I get it.

Speaker: Sam
Text: All right, I’m gonna head back to the ballroom, smart-ass. See you soon--
[Nate’s radio works funny again.]

Speaker: Nate
Text: Sam, you there? Sully? Great. Guys, if you can hear me, just about at the power room. Should be there soon. Ish.  Ah! Oh shit! (he falls]
[We switch to Sully and Nadine talking.]

Speaker: Nadine
Text: I can’t believe you got away with that.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Oh, we did not. No, we had our liberty taken away for a month.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: And what about the horse?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Fortunately, we had a lot of carrots on board. (chuckles]

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Recognize someone?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: No. I thought I did, but no.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Hey, when am I finally going to meet that partner of yours… Drake?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Well, that’s ex-partner.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Hmm.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: No, I’ve been flying solo for a while now. Drake’s out.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Oh. Like… “dead,” out?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Oh, no. More like “retired.”

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Hmm.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Last I heard, he settled down, got married.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Hm.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Well, then he might as well be dead, right?  Victor Sullivan! How the hell are you?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Rafe. How long has it been?

Speaker: Rafe
Text: How long has it been? Ten years? Twelve?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Fifteen.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: It’s amazing. All these years gone by here we are -- we’re still haggling over dead people’s junk. (chuckles]

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Really? Aren’t you running your parents’ business?

Speaker: Rafe
Text: My business now. But yes, that is my day job.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Ho ho. That is one helluva day job. You could probably afford to buy up everything on the block tonight.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Well, sure… but, what would be the point in that? These days I’m only looking for the… good stuff. Big scores.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Hmmm.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Any advice on what I should pick up tonight?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Ha. Yeah, like I’d want to bid against him.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: (chuckles]

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: But, um… just between you and me… I did notice they changed the order.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Hmm.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: I think somebody might be trying to rig this auction.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Hmm. Well, remember where we are. This crowd didn’t get rich by playing fair.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Which is why you really need someone watching your back in a place like this.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Ah. Well, I do hate to break it to ya… You are working for an American.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: With. We’ve partnered up on this one.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: I see.  Talk about a power couple.

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: In a few moments we’ll begin bidding on our next item… an inlaid wooden crucifix from the Trott Estate.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Well, I know when I’m a third wheel. You two kids have fun tonight.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Just hold on, Sully. How’d you find out about it?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: It? Now what “it” is that, Rafe? Nadine, I think your partner here has had too many Bloody Marys--

Speaker: Rafe
Text: (breakes Sully’s glass) Cut the bullshit, old man. Now I don’t know Flow you scammed your way in here. But if you think… about bidding on Avery’s cross, I can tell you exactly how you’re going to be leaving. In a goddamn body bag.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Rafe!

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Well. You get my point.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Lovely seeing you both.  Nate? Nate?! God damn it, kid. Where the hell are you?
[We switch to Nate. He managed not to die and climb up.]

Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay. Power room. I can do this. God, why did I pick the power room? Here we go. Now… where the hell are the circuit breakers? Ah, crap. Sam? Sully? You there?
[He reaches Sully on the radio.]

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Goddamn it, kid, where the hell’ve you been?

Speaker: Nate
Text: I made it. Had a few close calls, but--

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah, well if you’re gonna cut the power, now would be a good time.

Speaker: Nate
Text: All right, well, I’m gonna need a minute before I can reach the panel.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: We don’t have a minute, Rafe’s about to walk out of here with your cross.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Wait, what? Rafe? Rafe is here?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Yes, Rafe is here. And as of right now, he has the high bid.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, outbid him.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: With what? I don’t have that kind of scratch.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Sully, We’re stealing it, remember?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: What if he calls my bluff?

Speaker: Nate
Text: He won’t.

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: We have ninety thousand, do I hear any more bids?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Guys, if we do not get this cross, I am as good as dead.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah, well I end up with the highest bid, we’re all dead.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Sully, I teed you to buy me more time.

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: Since we have no other bids…

Speaker: Nate
Text: Trust me.

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: Going once… Going twice…

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Ah, screw it.

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: Bene! (Well!) We have one hundred thousand euros in the room. Thank you. Do we have any other bids?  We now have one hundred ten thousand euros in the room.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: In for a penny, in for a pound. (bidding]

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: That bid brings us to one hundred twenty.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Don’t worry, you’ll be out of there in no time.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Better be.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay… just gotta smash the lock. But with what?

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: Now the bid has reached one hundred thirty thousand.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Nope. Nothing. Damn it.

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: We are now at one hundred forty.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Gotta be something… C’mon…!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Hey man. Starting to sweat bullets here.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, gimme a sec!

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: Your bid, signore, takes us all the way to one hundred fifty thousand euros. The bidding stands at one hundred sixty thousand euros in the room.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yes!

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: Signore’s bid makes one hundred seventy thousand.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Gotcha!

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: We are non, at one hundred eighty thousand euros in the room.

Speaker: Nate
Text: All right, boys-- I’m at the switch. You ready?

Speaker: Sam
Text: As I’ll ever be. Victor?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Just a sec.

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: The gentleman’s bid: one hundred ninety thousand euros.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Five hundred thousand! Let’s get this show on the road here.

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: Uh… thank you. We have five hundred thousand euros in the room.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Had me worried there for a minute, Victor. Thought I might have to kill you!

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Okay. Let’s ruin this asshole’s evening.

Speaker: Auctioneer
Text: Anyone else? We are going once… Going twice… Then I shall sell it for five hundred thousand--  Ladies and gentlemen, please remain calm. The backup power will come on shortly. It’s gone!

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Move it! Get out of the way! Stop him! Hey-- stop that guy!

Speaker: Guard
Text: Fermo! (Stop!]

Speaker: Rafe
Text: What’re you doing? You’re letting him get away! Do you speak-- !

Speaker: Guard
Text: Sparisci! (Get lost!]

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Fine.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Sam, tell me you got the cross.

Speaker: Sam
Text: I got Saint Dismas right here, you wanna say hi?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah, we’ve really kicked the hornet’s nest down here. Ballroom’s locked down, security’s scrambling.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Hey, Victor, where’s our getaway?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Come to the driveway out front… just follow the spotlights. I’ll bring he car around.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Oh, shit! Okay… maybe we should’ve brought guns. Gotta climb and get a good vantage point…

Speaker: Sam
Text: How we doing, Nathan?

Speaker: Nate
Text: I’m on my way… heading to higher ground to get my bearings.

Speaker: Sam
Text: All right, see ya soon.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah. There’s the ballroom… driveway’s right in front. Okay. Everything’s fine. No one got a good look at me. I‘m just going to play it cool, stroll right on out of here.  Oh! Scusi. (Sorry.]

Speaker: Nadine
Text: You’re not supposed to be back here.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, neither are you. But I tell you what-- I won’t tell anyone if you don’t.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: You have something I want… and you’re going to give it to me.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Really? Well, I’m flattered but I’m afraid I’m spoken for. Now if you’ll excuse me--
[She hits him in the face.]

Speaker: Nadine
Text: I’m not in the mood for games. Give me the crucifix.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Lady… you’re lucky I ‘m a gentleman, ‘cause if I weren’t, I would--

Speaker: Nadine
Text: You’d what?

Speaker: Nate
Text: All right, fine. Just remember… I didn’t want to do this.
[Epic fight begins!]

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Let’s see what you’ve got. Nice try.

Speaker: Nate
Text: I gave you that one. Freebie.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Come here--!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Ah…!

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Now, hand me the artifact.

Speaker: Option 1
Text: Be specific

Speaker: Option 2
Text: It’s not yours

Speaker: Option 3
Text: Bargain (you pick that one]

Speaker: Nate
Text: All right, look… I have this nice… astrolabe back home-- slightly used-- I’ll give it to you for a fair price.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Ha, I have a better idea.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Oh, god… All right, look… I’m still a little jet-lagged. Oh, son of a…

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Have you had enough? Or do you want to keep being a smart ass?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, you know… being a smartass has gotten me this far in life… why quit now? All right, wait. Wait! It’s in my back pocket.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Where is it?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Right… there! (sucker punches her]

Speaker: Nate
Text: Whoaaa--!

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: All right, I’m at the car. Where the hell are you guys?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Ah, just met your friend Nadine Ross. She’s lovely.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah? Well, it’s total chaos out here. They’re trying to keep it contained, but everybody’s freaking out. I don’t wanna rush you, but… hurry the hell up!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan, where you at?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Good question. You?

Speaker: Sam
Text: By the ballroom. Look for this round sign thing, it’s on the way.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Round sign thing, check.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Good news is, I got a gun. See you soon.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay, we’re good, we’re good. Oh, shit!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan! What’re you doing?

Speaker: Nate
Text: What’s it look like?!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Oh shit! Nathan! Catch!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Wait-- what? Oh crap.  Hey, I got it!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nice shooting. You all right?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, hanging in there.

Speaker: Sam
Text: I can’t get to you from here, you got a way down?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah. Yeah, I think so.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Okay. I’ll meet you at the driveway, just head towards the ballroom.

Speaker: Nate
Text: All right, see ya there.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Victor, I’m kinda stuck here, any ideas?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Fastest way is through the ballroom!

Speaker: Sam
Text: You said the ballroom’s locked down.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah, well now that they know it’s you guys, they cleared the place out.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Ballroom it is. You get that, Nathan?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, got it! Okay… almost to the ballroom.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan, I’m pinned down in here! I could use a hand!

Speaker: Nate
Text: On my way, Sam! All right, here we go. Ha ha! Aaaaaahhhh!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Jesus Christ. Nathan?!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Hey! How’s it going?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Uh… think I’m done with this auction, huh?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Oh yeah. Me too.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: All right boys, change of plan! Too many people trying to leave, the driveway’s all jammed up.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Shit. What’s our backup?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: There’s that fountain just outside the ballroom. I’ll meet you there!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan, move!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Got it. Let’s go!

Speaker: Sam
Text: He’s down! Nathan, they brought more friends! We need to get the hell out of here!

Speaker: Sam
Text: I hit him!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Outta my personal space!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Got ya, Nathan!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, keep doin’ that. Sam, fills way!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Right behind you!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Sully, we’re running out of time here!

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Hold on, kid… nearly there! Almost there.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Unless you’re driving a hearse, you better hurry.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Guy’s down!

Speaker: Nate
Text: No, no, no, no!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Downed one!

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Someone call for a limo?
[Nate runs into Sully’s limo.]

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan, time to go! Go, go, go!

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Hang on!
[Next scene. Hideout.]

Speaker: Sam
Text: Okay. I hope I don’t go to hell for this. Shit.
Action: (ready to smash the cross with hammer)

Speaker: Nate
Text: What?!

Speaker: Sam
Text: It’s empty.

Speaker: Nate
Text: What?  Ah, you’re such an asshole.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: He’s your brother. All right, skull and crossbones. Very good sign.

Speaker: Sam
Text: That’s Avery’s insign… What is this? Ah… “Hodie mecum eris in Paradiso.”

Speaker: Nate
Text: “Today you will join me in Paradise.”

Speaker: Sam
Text: --in Paradise. It’s what Jesus said to Saint Dismas on the Cross, but…

Speaker: Nate
Text: Right.

Speaker: Sam
Text: What about these numbers here? at do you make of this?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Some kind of code? Or a phone number?

Speaker: Nate
Text: C’mon. They’re dates…

Speaker: Sam
Text: Huh?

Speaker: Sam
Text: That’s the year Avery was born.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Lemme guess, the year he died?

Speaker: Sam
Text: By most accounts, yeah, but… That means we have date of birth, date of death and “Paradise.” Which means we’re looking for… Avery’s grave.

Speaker: Nate
Text: At Saint Dismas’ Cathedral…

Speaker: Sam
Text: Huh.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Wait a second. Hasn’t Rafe been scouring that site for ages already?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, the cathedral. See these symbols?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah.

Speaker: Nate
Text: These are found on old Scottish gravestones. Right? Now look at this. The layout of his place is really unusual.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Here’s the cathedral. But the graveyard… is way over here.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Rafe’s been focusing on the wrong area.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Exactly.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Guys. We’re going to Scotland.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: All right, all right. Wait-- wait up. You do realize that Rafe knows you’re coming?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, we can deal with that when we get there.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: That psycho would like nothing better than for you to show up. Plus he’s got Nadine and her hole army to back him up!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, but he doesn’t have this. The biggest pirate treasure of all ti is within our grasp.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: I thought this was about saving Sam.

Speaker: Nate
Text: It is. But come on, it’s both, right? We need the treasure so we can save Sam.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: How is Elena cool with all this? Oh, Jesus, kid.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Look, it’s just not that simple.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: With all that you two have been through together.

Speaker: Nate
Text: She wouldn’t understand this.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yo are not giving her enough credit.

Speaker: Nate
Text: I can’t take that chance.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan, he’s right. Things have changed. Rafe’s involved now. And… I can-- I can take this on my own. Really.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Great. Well, thank you for your Both of you. Excuse me.  Hey. Hey, it’s me, yeah. No, the reception’s lousy. Yeah…

Speaker: Sam
Text: Something on your mind, dear?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Look, I um, I realize it couldn’t have been easy… all those years way. And I’m sorry for what happened to you.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Hmph.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: But it’s not his fault.

Speaker: Sam
Text: I never said that it was.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Took a long time for him to get out of this game.

Speaker: Sam
Text: You see a gun to his head? He chose this. Okay. He’s meant for this life.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: You really believe that?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Why are you here, Victor?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Because somebody’s gotta keep an eye out for him.

Speaker: Nate
Text: No, I’ll just see you in a few more weeks? I love you too. Bye.  Just told her that the job is gonna take a little longer than expected. Which is the truth. So come on, what do you say? Sam could still use our help.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Well… I do hear that the weather is particularly fine in Scotland this time of year.
[They drink and scene changes to Scotland.]

Speaker: Sam
Text: Well. Rafe’s really going all in, isn’t he?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well; they’re all concentrated around the cathedral, so that‘s good… because we are going to have that graveyard all to ourselves. Sully.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Hey, listen, we’re good to go here.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Okay, kid. Happy hunting.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Last chance to come with.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah, well, unless you can find me an escalator, I think I’ll pass.

Speaker: Nate
Text: All right. We’ll see you in a few.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Hey, Nate--

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Just-- Ah, just bring me back something shiny, will ya?

Speaker: Nate
Text: That’s the plan.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Well… Let’s go pay our respects to Captain Avery, huh?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Text: [Nate and Sam walk to the cathedral on snow-capped mountains.]

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: A Scottish cathedral. Strange place to bury your treasure, no?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Not really. I mean, by the time Avery would’ve sailed here, the place was already abandoned.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: I guess that’s true. Plus, with the massive bounty on his head… it’d be a good place to hide. So… what happened between you and Rafe?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: I couldn’t deal with him… and I’m pretty sure he’d had enough of me.I was still coming to grips your, uh… “death,” and with his frustration from not finding the treasure… Well, I’m pretty sure he was ready to kill me by the time I bailed.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Ha. Imagine what he’d want to do to you now.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah. Trying not to. Sam, listen. He’s ruthless. I mean even more so than when we teamed up with him. I mean, I’ve heard stories.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Trust me, me too. All the more reason I don’t feel bad about any of this.  It’s a long drop.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yea. Need to find another way down. Hey, this should hold.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Oh. Good call.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: What the hell is all this.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: It’s excavation equipment.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Shoreline…?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: What?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Look. I thought they were just by the cathedral!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Look, they’re here!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Oh, shit, get down! I got one! Okay. We’re good.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, nice to meet you too, Shoreline. Seems like they were expecting us.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: …And like they’re searching away from the cathedral.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Which means we should get to that graveyard, pronto. (quickly]

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Exactly. What is this place?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: The monks had several living quarters… the main one being by the graveyard, of course.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Location, location, location.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Now what do you bet…? Hey! Dynamite!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Hey, be careful with that stuff, huh?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: There ya go. Take that, door.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: You’re pretty good with that stuff.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Well I’ve blown a lot of shit up over the years.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: What’s the, uh… plan with the crate?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Not sure yet.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary
Text: The explosion definitely came from here. Let’s do a full sweep, hey?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Shit, Shoreline. Hide! That shut him up . Get down! Good shot! Got ‘em! Nathan, take cover! I got one! All right. Nicely done… that could’ve been bad.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah. Let’s get out of here before anyone checks in on them. There. C’mon… let’s go. Got it.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Whoa, careful.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: I can hook that. There. Whoo. All right, you think you can do that?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: What are you talking about? I taught you that move!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: All right, let’s see it then.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: There, you see?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Sam! There’s a ladder just out of reach.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: All right, hold up. I’ll come over. All right. Gimme a boost. Hold up. C’mere. I’ll pull you up. There ya… go.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Ah, thanks.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: There…

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: All right, there it is. The monks’ dorm. Just a hop, skip, and a jump away.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Ah, don’t jinx us.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Down we go. Ah! Whoo, burns a little.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, those are fun.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary
Text: The next, he’s paying us double to wipe them out.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Shh. Quiet.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: You go where the money leads you.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: That’s cold.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: It gets colder. I’m gonna take a leak while you educate our young recruit here.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: So what happened next? Did he put down the revolt?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Wih our help he kept it at bay. But once money ran out… well, there was no reason for us to stick around anymore.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Nice one.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: You get the left one, I got right.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary
Text: And the general? Didn’t even last the night.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Gonna have to do better than that, fellas.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Let’s see if we can keep this up.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: You two done prepping the site? The cemetery is ready for Rich Boy’s visit.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: They’re not slowing down are they?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Boss lady wants results and she wants them yesterday.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: Have they found anything?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Heard they uncovered some stuff… but I don’t know the details.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Did you see that? Like a ninja.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Ha ha. Pretty slick, brother. Pretty slick.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Right beyond those walls. Down we go.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Where does that rich arsehole get off?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: Easy, bru.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: I nearly blew my goddamn arms off only to get chewed out by that prick! I shoulda popped him.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: The guy’s fronting our entire crew. What do you think Nadine would do to you?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: I was following her order.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: Still, what do you think she’d do?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Turn me inside out.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: Exactly. Take some deep breaths and go walk it off.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Stroppy prick thinks he can tell me how to do my job. The American sure isn’t making any friends. Well, as long as his money’s good, that’s fine by me.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: You think Drake’s gonna show up?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Nadine seems to think so. I’d love to see him and his crew make an appearance.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: That goes for all of us.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: All right, let’s keep going.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Sam, this way!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Nice.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! Oh, shit!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Okay, if he did it, I can do it. Whoa, whoa.  It’s better than bungee jumping.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Have you ever been bungee jumping?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: No, but I’m sure this is better. So, this is what you’ve been up to all these years? Jumping around ruins?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah. That and… getting shot at. Blown up. Punched. Kicked.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: All right, all right. I get it.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Knifed. Drugged. Ha ha. And that’s that.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Ah, not quite. Still gotta climb higher to cross the ravine.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: All right, I hope we’re done sliding for a while. My ass is full of gravel.  Stuck the landing. Come on.  All right, I got it. Go.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Okay. Come on.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: And we’re here.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Yes we are. Jesus. Look at this place.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Welcome to the Saint Dismas dormitory… alleged final resting place of one Henry Avery.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Let’s find that grave. Hey, Nathan. Check it out. This one’s got a pair of cutlasses. Just like the scroll from the cross.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: But the dates aren’t right.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Well… one down and… a hell of a lot to go.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay… crossed cutlasses, skull and crossbones, and the dates 1639 to 1699. We find a tombstone with all three and we’re in business.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Well… let’s desecrate some graves.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Let’s. No skull and crossbones. Nice Celtic cross… not the grave we want, though. Yeah, well… the swords are a match. So is the year… Sam, c’mere.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: What, did you Ind it?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Look. Benjamin Bridgeman.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: That’s Avery’s alias. (laughs]

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Something odd about this skull though. It’s like it doesn’t belong to the stone.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Well yeah, what’s odd about it is… that’s not Avery’s sigil.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Oh, yeah… I mean, the skull should be facting--

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam & Nate
Text: Sideways.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Text: [They turn the skull.]

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: What is that?  Oh my God.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: You ready for this?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Oh, I’ve been ready for a long time. Look at that.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Let’s see what we got… It’s a crypt.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: A crypt, hidden behind a secret door?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: I assume the secret door was added afterwards.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: To hide his loot.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, fingers crossed. Whoa, the gang’s all here. Jesus… Dismas on the left…

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Penitent thief.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Gestas on the right…

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Jerk thief.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Avery sure had a thing for Saint Dismas, huh?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, Avery fancied himself a “good thief,” right? Only plundered and murdered the non-British heathens.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Guess that’s what passed for “good” back then.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Good enough.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Some kind of lamp. Hey, smokey-- Need your lighter over here.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: You know, that hurts my feelings.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Not as much as it hurts your lungs.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Thank you, Father Duffy.  Ooh.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Well isn’t that something?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Uh-uh. The light’s coming from the other side of the wall .

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: All right, let’s see here. Ah. I can aim the lights. Hey, here we go…

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: I think you got that one! Uh, connect the dots.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: There we go.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan, that’s it! You got it!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay. Let’s give this a shot?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Open sesame.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Wrong treasure.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Shush.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mate
Text: (chuckles]

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: (chuckles]

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, nice view. No treasure though.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: No, but… look, you see those crosses?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Oh, yeah. Hey, is that a cave… right below?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, I think Avery’s trying to tell where to go next. Uh, there’s one problem though. Going back that way n ans we have to go back toward the cathedral.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: And back towards Rafe.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Shit.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, let’s not keep him waiting.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Spread out! You know the drill.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Shit.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Anybody heard from the scout party uphill?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: Nothing. You think we have guests?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Straight ahead.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Don’t I wish. The storm’s been messing with the radios. They’re practically useless.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: If we don’t hear back from them soon, I’ll go check in with them.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, this should be fun!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Shit!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Get off him! They’re surrounding you!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Whoa. Shit. Nathan, watch it! I hit him!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Picked up some new tricks, I see!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay. I think we’re clear.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Well… that could’ve gone better.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Hey, well… we’re still breathing. That’s good enough.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Let’s just get that gate open.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: How you holding up?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Great. Was kinda hoping to find the treasure back there, but… you know, it’s never that easy, right?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: That’s been my experience.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Plus there was that cool constellation thing.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah it was cool. Wow.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Hmph. Pretty spectacular.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Right under that high cross… that’s there Avery wants us.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, what Avery wants, Avery gets.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Kid? What’s your status?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Hey, Sully. We’re on the trail, but the treasure’s closer to the cathedral than we originally thought.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Oh, boy. So what do you need me to do?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, just keep those engines warm. We’ll be back before too long.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sullivan
Text: You got it. Keep me posted.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Will do.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Patrol up ahead.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: I hear ‘em.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Getting real antsy here.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: You of all people should appreciate the downtime. Nobody wants another Port Moresby, on our heads.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: How about don’t talk if you weren’t there, hey? Everything’s called a massacre nowadays to generate buzz.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: We don’t need that kind of press.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: We don’t need rival companies stepping into our jobs.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: You know what… forget it.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Why’d you bring it up then?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: I said forget it.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Whatever, man.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: We’re good. They don’t see us. I guess there’s no getting away from these guys.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, and there’ll only be more as we get closer to the cathedral. Here we go. Come on, I’ll boost you up there.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: All right… Ah, hell. I’m too high to reach you. Yeah, hang on a sec.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Hanging.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Let me see what’s by that wooden structure over there. Hey, I got something. Here… we… go… Christ, this thing’s heavy…

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: What exactly are you doing?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Giving you… a way up. That’ll support even your weight.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Ah. Thank you.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Hey, you don’t think the monks built this?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: No way. It’s some kind of pulley system.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Ah, to lift a whole bunch of treasure?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: To lift something… I can’t believe I missed this.  Hey, we can climb this!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: On my way.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay… maybe this wasn’t such a good idea. Aaahhh!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Incoming!  That was amazing.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, save your strength, huh. We’re not done yet.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Just lead the way.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Hope this holds. Whooaa! I hope this was a good idea. Oh shit! Damn it.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Gotta say, you have a real knack for breaking things. Especially cliffs.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Tell me about it. A-- Ah! For Christ’s sake.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: You okay?!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah…

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Like I was just saying…

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, yeah, yeah…

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: All right, hold on. I’ll-- I’ll see if there’s another-- Oh, shit!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Sam! I guess it runs in the family, huh?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Maybe so. Oh. You got it. I can’t feel my hands… I think my blood thinned out or something after all those years in Panama. Hold on. I’ll help you up. There ya go. Where would you be without me, huh?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Uh, probably at home… drinking hot cocoa.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: What are you, five?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Oh, tell me you wouldn’t go for some hot cocoa right now.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, I mean… yeah.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Exactly. Here we go.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Fire in the hole!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Jesus.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: How we lookin’?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: Still some debris blocking the way in. We can’t get all the way through.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Kak. That was the last of the dynamite.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: Next patrol will bring more by. Just sit tight.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Jesus. That was close.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Hey, careful… might be unstable after the blast.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Who does excavation with dynamite?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Hey, Sam. Help me with this.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Whoa-- What if it’s the only thing holding the tunnel up?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Then I’ll apologize. Go!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: All right.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: There, see? No problem.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Yeah, for once. Those things look sturdy to you?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Sturdy enough. Hey, be extra careful on these. Oh, crap!

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Remember, “extra careful?”

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Uh uh, okay. Okay, we’re good. We’re good.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Kid, storm’s picking up. How’s it looking?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: We’re about to head into the cave.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sullivan
Text: The cave?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah… might lose contact for a bit. Don’t get too worried.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sullivan
Text: All right, I’ll keep the porch light on for ya.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: All right. Call you soon.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: We made it. It’s quite the detour.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Let’s go see what Avery left for us.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Yes please.  Those Shoreline assholes were right next to this cave.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, but I think we’re the first ones in here.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Oh… is that a door?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: It sure looks like it. C’mere. Check this out. A little slimy. There’s a handle in here or something.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Well… Give it a-- give it a pull.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: What? Could be a trap.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: You’re already in there. What’s the… what’s the worst that can happen?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Uh, I lose my hand?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: So we’ll get you a nice hook. Give it a pull.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Nice hook. All right, here we go. (chuckles]

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Really?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Hello, hello.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Pretty interesting decor.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: “For those who prove worthy, Paradise awaits… To those who prove false, behold your grim fate.”

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Yeah, well I guess Avery was a better pirate than a poet.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: This… this isn’t Avery’s.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: What do you mean?

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Look.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: It’s the Rhode Island Pirate.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Thomas Tew.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: Yeah. But it can’t be him. I mean, this is clearly his sigil, but… Tew died attacking the same treasure fleet as Avery.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, well at least that’s what the stories tell us.

Chapter: Chapter 8: The Grave of Henry Avery
Speaker: Sam
Text: If this really is Tew’s mark… then that means he’s involved in all of this… how?
[Sam and Nate begin to explore the insides of Avery’s crypt.]

Speaker: Nate
Text: That’s a damn good question. So who do you think these guys are?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Those who prove false, I guess. I think Avery, or Thomas Tew there just trying to scare us.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Good thing we’re jaded treasure hunters.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Good thing.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Whoa… It’s okay, it’s holding! Come on.

Speaker: Sam
Text: These bridges are clearly not built to code.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Sure they are. The pirate code.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Not bad.

Speaker: Sam
Text: No, no, no, no! Well, we’re not going back that way.

Speaker: Nate
Text: At least we didn’t get dropped in a pit or something.

Speaker: Sam
Text: This is… elaborate.

Speaker: Nate
Text: You could say that. Found another switch. Yeah, I’m just gonna take the… hand… out. Whoa.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Jesus. It’s a pretty elaborate test? Or trial?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah… one this guy clearly failed.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Then let’s do better. There’s something on the bottom there.

Speaker: Nate
Text: It’s a bucket.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Huh. Okay. Now what?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Aah. Oh! Bucket filled!

Speaker: Sam
Text: All right, pass it up to me. I’m gonna put it back in that big wheel thingie. Bingo.

Speaker: Nate
Text: All right, let’s see what these wheels do. Okay… I think I see what’s going on here.

Speaker: Sam
Text: There’s something with the three crosses?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah. I’m guessing we’re looking at Jesus, our good thief Dismas, and the jerk thief Gestas.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, I’m gonna figure the white cross is Dismas.

Speaker: Nate
Text: So the black one is Gestas. There we go. Hey Sam, was Dismas to the left of Jesus?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, are you looking at them from the front or the back?

Speaker: Nate
Text: The front.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Then yeah, he was on the left.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay, that’s what’ve got.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Hey check it out – something up there moved when you put the bucket on top.

Speaker: Nate
Text: There’s a channel running from the mechanism to the door.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Okay… so bucket on top is good. Keep it there.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Think that’s it?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, you could try pulling the switch.

Speaker: Nate
Text: I could. Okay, that’s gotta be it.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Let’s find out.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Ah, ah…

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan, look -- I think you got it!

Speaker: Nate
Text: All right, see.

Speaker: Sam
Text: (sighs]

Speaker: Nate
Text: No shishkanates, no natekabobs today.

Speaker: Sam
Text: So, if that was a test… what do you suppose it was testing, exactly? Filling a bucket?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Had to know about Saint Dismas, who I bet Avery and all of his crew were intimately familiar with.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Not that hard of a test.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Whoa… watch your step.

Speaker: Sam
Text: As I live and breathe, would you look at this place.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Hey, come here. I’ll boost you up there.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Coming. Okay, I got something for ya up here. Use this to reach those hand holds on the wall.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Good call.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Follow me! They’re sure not making this easy, are they?

Speaker: Nate
Text: I imagine it was easier when all the… bridges and walkways weren’t broken.

Speaker: Sam
Text: I guess we’re a couple hundred years late. Let’s see what’s in here. Hey, there’s a low ceiling here. Watch your-- Ow!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Watch my… ah?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Can it. This way. Ah, maybe through here? I see some light through here. Ah, catacombs.

Speaker: Nate
Text: That makes sense… we’re under a cathedral. Hey, hold-- hold on…

Speaker: Sam
Text: What?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Listen.
[They overhear Nadine and Rafe.]

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Anything noteworthy by the dormitories?

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Not unless you count some cleverly worded headstones.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Have you finished digging by the chapter-house?

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: We have, ma’am. The northwest sites are wide open as well.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: And what about the southern perimeter?

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Not yet; It’d take us a day to move the crane over there.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Nadine.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Make it happen. In the meantime see when you can dig up without it.

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: I’ll send a couple of men over there.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Good. Rafe, any luck with those manuscripts?

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Can we have a minute?

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Keep me updated.

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Yes, ma’am.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Did you hear? They found a whole annexed area under the cathedral.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: I did. Have you seen it?

Speaker: Nadine
Text: No. Why?

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Because there wasn’t much left… after they’d finished “finding” it.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: My men have been a bit liberal with the dynamite.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: They’re like a hundred well-armed bulls in a china shop.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: …but they’ve made more progress in two days than we’ve made in months.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Progress? I can’t analyze rubble.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Okay.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Thank you.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: I’ll let them know to give you a heads up before they do anything drastic.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Or you can tell them to sit tight until I analyze the few clues that haven’t been blown up.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: No, we can’t sit around waiting any longer.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: All due respect, I think I have a bit more experience with this sort of thing than you do.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: We tried things your way.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Bullshit. You’ve been wanting to level this place ever since we got here.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: No. I wanted to steal that cross long before it ever even made it to that auction. The same auction where I couldn’t have my men around to deal with any surprises.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: The auction was the cleanest way to get the cross.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: But instead of going with my gut, I listened to you. And now we have competition.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Well, I didn’t think he’d show up.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Or maybe you wanted to draw him out.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Why-- Why the hell would I do that?

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Because you think you need him. And maybe you do. Point is, I’m done trying to do things the clean way. If the treasure is here, we’ll find it. And if not, well… maybe it’s time to move on, huh? Hey… it’s not personal.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: Of course.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: I’ll let you know if anything turns up.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Let’s get moving before they blow that treasure to bits.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Or they start making out.

Speaker: Nate
Text: (chuckles]

Speaker: Sam
Text: Hey, wait… You think she was right, though?

Speaker: Nate
Text: About what?

Speaker: Sam
Text: About Rafe wanting to draw you out.

Speaker: Nate
Text: As long as he doesn’t get the upper hand, who cares? Doesn’t matter.

Speaker: Sam
Text: What annexed area you suppose they were talking about?

Speaker: Nate
Text: It’s gotta be some side chamber because we’re the only ones here.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Ah, a little too high to jump up there, unless you’ve got a… trampoline.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Left it in my backyard.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Wait do you -- do you have a trampoline?

Speaker: Nate
Text: I wish. Hang on.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Oh, look at you.

Speaker: Nate
Text: One crate, coming up.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Why thank you, good sir. Jesus.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, we’re definitely getting closer to Gotta say, this is far more sophisticated than I was expecting.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Me too…

Speaker: Nate
Text: Bridge is out. Gotta find another way across. Here goes nothing!

Speaker: Sam
Text: It’s a good thing you’re not heavier than the crate.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay… Made it.

Speaker: Sam
Text: What‘s the plan?

Speaker: Nate
Text: I’m working on it. We can hook our ropes onto this.

Speaker: Sam
Text: That’ll work.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Ah… who needs bridges?

Speaker: Sam
Text: I don’t know. I-- I wouldn’t mind bridges, per se.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, can’t go through there.

Speaker: Sam
Text: So, how do we get through?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Over here.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Look at that.

Speaker: Nate
Text: If this place wasn’t completely falling apart, we’d probably Be trapped again.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan. Look around you.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Holy crap. This must’ve been another test, but… it all just crumbled into the ocean.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, I guess the test now is, how the hell do we get to the other side?

Speaker: Nate
Text: What’s this? (he read old note]

Speaker: It started with the cross
Text: a cryptic message from my old compatriot with a vague promise of Paradise. I was skeptical, but the thought of living the remainder of my days at home, wondering what might have been, was too much to bear. And one does not ignore a letter from the King of Pyrates.

Speaker: Sam
Text: That really safe-looking wooden seesaw thing might do the trick.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Worth a shot. Well, here goes nothing. Whoa, whoa. Steady.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan, Nathan, stop! You won’t make it, you’re too low. I’ll weigh it down. Go.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Made it.

Speaker: Sam
Text: All right! Uh… now… What about me? Check out all that machinery: You know, really makes you appreciate everything that goes into making one of these deathtraps.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Ha. Don’t be glib.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Who’s being glib? This is a marvel of human engineering! Any luck?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, gimme a sec. Okay, found something to weigh down the seesaw.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Excellent. You sure that’ll work?

Speaker: Nate
Text: It’s heavier than I am.

Speaker: Sam
Text: I don’t know about that.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, yeah. There we go.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Going up! Whoaa, whoa!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Hey nice air time.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Ah. Well, if treasure hunting doesn’t work out, we can always join the circus.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Oh, crap!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Run! Quick! I got you. There.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Thanks.

Speaker: Sam
Text: That’s another test den.

Speaker: Nate
Text: At this point, I’d rather take another deathtrap.

Speaker: Sam
Text: At this point I hope we’re at the end of this thing.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay… getting a bit dramatic with the statues here.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Seriously. Why decorate a treasure burial site?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Or build elaborate tests. Ugh. I’ll never get used to this.

Speaker: Sam
Text: It’s another cross. At least this one has some jewels on it, right?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Whoa, whoa, don’t… touch it.

Speaker: Sam
Text: What? Why?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Look at it. It’s the only valuable thing we’ve seen in this cave.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Right.

Speaker: Nate
Text: This is another test.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Greed.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah. Or lack thereof.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Okay, so…

Speaker: Nate
Text: It’s-- It’s gotta be the coins.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Coins. Are we sure about this?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, pretty sure.

Speaker: Sam
Text: “Pretty sure” will have to do.

Speaker: Nate
Text: All right, just… just one now.

Speaker: Sam
Text: I got it. Greed. Please don’t be a trap.
[Sam take one coin and light coming from the ceiling and draw a map on the floor.]

Speaker: Nate
Text: Whoa.  You recognize the shape?

Speaker: Sam
Text: It’s Madagascar.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Look. The star right here.

Speaker: Sam
Text: That’s Kings Bay.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yes it is.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Son of a bitch. He’s screwing with us…

Speaker: Nate
Text: What are you talking about?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Avery. He’s screwing with us. This was supposed to be it. So where’s the goddamned treasure, huh? I mean, King’s Bay? Great, But what’s next? North Pole? Outer space? Nathan?

Speaker: Nate
Text: “For those who prove worthy… Paradise awaits.” He-- was recruiting.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Who was recruit--

Speaker: Nate
Text: Avery… was recruiting.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Recruiting for what?
[Explosion. Nadine appears.]

Speaker: Nate
Text: Ah, crap.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: You gentlemen, are very, very noisy. Guns on the floor. Slowly. I still owe you from last time.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Throwing me out a window didn’t do it for you?

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Rafe. Rafe, come in.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: I’m at the graveyard. Nadine, they were here.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Yeah, I’m looking at them right now.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: What? Where are you?

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Come back to the Cathedral. Follow the holes.

Speaker: Rafe
Text: I’m on my way. And for God’s sake don’t shoot them yet.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Might want to hurry, then. King’s Bay.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Yeah but, uh.… where in King’s Bay? You’ll need that cross over there to figure it out. But… there’re only two people that can tell you how to use it.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Let me guess… you two.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, you wanna leave it to Rafe, you’re gonna be waiting a long time.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Sorry boys. I’m not here to negotiate. Bring me the crucifix.

Speaker: Nate
Text: It’s not a crucifix.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: What?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, technically a crucifix refers to a cross that… You know what… never mind.

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Don’t touch it!
[The mercenary takes the cross and the floor falls. Sam and Nate runs away.]

Speaker: Mercenary
Text: Aaaggghhh!

Speaker: Nadine
Text: Shoot them!

Speaker: Sam
Text: This way, c’mon!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Ah! God damn it!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Holy shit. Nathan!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Get out of there! I’ll cover you!

Speaker: Nate
Text: On it! Oh, shit!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan?!

Speaker: Nate
Text: I’m okay! Ah, gotta get off this thing. Now’s my chance! C’mon, c’mon, c’mon.

Speaker: Sam
Text: And stay down. Shit! Sucks for you. Ah, hell. What’s the plan? Up there! C’mon, you ready? We gotta go up to get out. Nathan?!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Coming!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nathan!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Here… we… go… Oh, no, no, no! That works. Hey, Sam!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Coming! Good work! Happy to help. Man, we really kicked the hornet’s nest, didn’t we?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, we kicked it, punched it, and set it’s on fire.

Speaker: Sam
Text: I got one! Nice shot! Got ‘em!

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: God damn it, Nate. I can hear the fireworks from here. What the hell’s going on?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Long story; short version is get us the hell out of here!

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah, I figured. Hold tight, be there soon as I can!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Ah, hell-- Sam, watch the turret!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Good shot!

Speaker: Nate
Text: My turn now!

Speaker: Sam
Text: To your right!

Speaker: Sam
Text: I hit him!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Whoa. Shit.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nice shot, little brother! That’s it, let’s keep moving!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Ah, shit--! Sam! Sniper!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Jesus! Nice shot!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Find cover!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Up there, more of ‘em! All right, you got him!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Downed one! Keep running! Don’t stop! Is this how it always is for you?!

Speaker: Nate
Text: No! Well, kind of. Yeah… yes. Yes, definitely.

Speaker: Sam
Text: I got one! God, wasn’t Victor saying the weather is lovely this time of year?! I can’t see shit.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Just keep heading down until we hit the water. Sam, down here! Crap, we gotta get past these guys.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Good shot, Nathan! Guy’s down!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Shit.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Boys, they’re shooting at my plane. Hurry the hell up, or your ride’s gonna sink!

Speaker: Sam
Text: You got him!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay, here we go… ahh! Get ready!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Ah, this is gonna suck!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Aahh! Sully! Get her going! C’mon! C’mon! Go, go!
[They get to the plane and fly away.]

Speaker: Nate
Text: Here. That was a close one, huh?

Speaker: Sallivan
Text: They shot up my goddamned plane, Nate!

Speaker: Sam
Text: We’re fine, thanks. How soon can you get us to Madagascar?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: No treasure, then.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Not yet.

Speaker: Sam
Text: I don’t know what you’re talking about? Look. We’re rich! (shows them the coin he get in the cave]

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Jesus… Suppose it’s a start. And you think the rest is in Madagascar?

Speaker: Nate
Text: There was a chamber back there with a giant map of Madagascar on the floor, so… Yeah, it’s probably there.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: This is beginning to smell a whole lot like wild goose, kid.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Look, the treasure was never in Scotland, okay?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Then what was the point of all that, huh? Of the Saint Dismas cross?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Look. It’s like I said, I think Avery was recruiting people. The cross was an invitation. The caves were just some sort of… initiation.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Oh, so we all passed, huh? Congrats, Victor. We get eye patches and parrots now.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: I don’t get it. Why the hell would they go to all that bother just to weed people out?

Speaker: Nate
Text: To protect himself. the most wanted man in the world at that time. He had to enlist people that he could trust in order to keep their treasure secret.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Whaddya mean, “their” treasure?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Just-- think about this. Thomas Tew was a successful pirate in his own right. What would he possibly stand to gain from joining Avery? I think Avery sent out crosses only to the other wealthy pirates like himself. What if they pooled and hid all their treasure together?

Speaker: Sam
Text: That would make the Gunsway haul look like chump change.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Ho ho, holy shit. Okay, so where exactly in Madagascar are we going?

Speaker: Sam
Text: King’s Bay. It was an old pirate haven back in Avery’s time.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: I know it well… It’s a big place. Anything more specific?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, that map chamber completely caved uh, so, you know… What are you laughing about?

Speaker: Nate
Text: The people who survived the caves… the recruits. What’s the one thing they would’ve left with?

Speaker: Sam
Text: There’s a volcano on this.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Huh… and there’s a volcano near King’s Bay. Which means we need to get to a move on.
[Next scene. Nate calls Elena.]

Speaker: Elena
Text: Hey! Hey, Nate?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Hi, honey.

Speaker: Elena
Text: Hi, I’ve been trying to get a hold of you. Are you okay?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, of course. What do you mean?

Speaker: Elena
Text: Oh, you know, the news… there’s been all that flooding. Maybe going to Malaysia during the monsoon season wasn’t such a good idea?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, right… Right. Yeah, it uh-- it grounded us for sure, you know… Had some equipment failure… but you know no one’s hurt or anything.

Speaker: Elena
Text: Well, as long as you guys are safe. So, are you going to start work tomorrow?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Postponed, actually. Looks like we’re gonna need maybe another ten days or so.

Speaker: Elena
Text: Ugh, ten days? Hey, well… why don’t I just uh, go ahead and buy a ticket then.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Oh, you know you don’t have to do that. It’s fine. I mean, you know these guys always overestimate things. I’m sure it’ll be less time than that.

Speaker: Elena
Text: Okay, well… You know, don’t rush, make sure that you’re safe.

Speaker: Nate
Text: I will. Always do. Listen, I’m-- I’m sorry I gotta go. Jameson’s calling me over.

Speaker: Elena
Text: Okay…

Speaker: Nate
Text: I love you.

Speaker: Elena
Text: Love you too.
[Next scene. Savanna.]

Speaker: Sam
Text: What’s the satellites saying, Victor?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Right now, not a goddamn thing. I lost the signal.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Hey, y’know what never loses its signal? Paper. All right, this route right should take us straight to the volcano. Might get a little bumpy though.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Let’s get this show on the road.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Okay.

Speaker: Nate
Text: All right.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: So, what’re we doing for out here?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, the map shows all these structures around the volcano. Some abandoned outposts, a handful, of watch towers.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Watch towers?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Avery was the most wanted man in the world, so if he was hiding something out here, makes sense he’d heed lookouts.

Speaker: Nate
Text: And one of those towers is right on the volcano.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: With Avery’s treasure?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Fingers crossed.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: I see some ruins up ahead.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Wait here, I’ll go take a look.

Speaker: Sam
Text: So, Victor, you still do a lot of traveling these days?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: I try… I tend to, pick jobs that get me away from the computer.

Speaker: Sam
Text: I was telling Nathan… it’s shocking how much of the business has moved to the internet. I mean, I bet you have all sorts of options to get rid of hot cargo now.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah, sure but I prefer talking to clients face-to-face… get a good read on ‘em. Hard to do that in a chat room talking to some guy named “Antiquity Master 37.”

Speaker: Nate
Text: Hmm. Not much to see here.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Well?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Ah, nothing worthwhile. C’mon, let’s keep going. So with our luck, what are the odds this volcano is going to erupt on us?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Zero. It’s extinct. Trust me, that’s the first thing I looked up when we said we were heading for a volcano. That, and where to rent the cheapest 4x4.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Wait, Sully… you’re telling me that you actually did some research?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Can’t let you be the know-it-all every time, kid.

Speaker: Sam
Text: That bridge there is what you would call “rickety.”

Speaker: Nate
Text: Ah, this looks promising. C’mon, c’mon, baby. Let’s go. Go, go, go, go! Made it.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Okay, kid. Just… don’t drop us.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Hey, just-- keep it slow… keep it in the center.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah, there’s a lot of backseat driving going on right now.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Whoa!

Speaker: Nate
Text: We’re good. Everything’s good.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Jesus Christ. Onward and upward.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Agh, we’re getting nowhere fast.

Speaker: Sam
Text: You need traction here. Nathan, the rocks.

Speaker: Nate
Text: I got it, I’m got it. Okay, think I’m getting the hang of this…

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Oh, Jesus. Oh, my spine.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Look, tire tracks-- someone came up this way.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Hey, look up there on the hill! Got a tower or something.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Now we’re talking.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Hey, Victor, what were you arguing with the rental guy about?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Oh, your brother insisted on getting a 4x4 with a winch.

Speaker: Sam
Text: So you sprung for the winch, but you couldn’t spring for the suspension. I got it.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Hey it’s important. Going off road, it might rain, might be muddy.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: I’ll bet we go this whole goddamn thing and never use that winch.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Whoa!

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Ah shit--! Take this slow, kid…

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah…

Speaker: Sam
Text: So Nathan, you’re thinking Avery, Tew, and some other big-shot pirates pooled their treasure, and came out here because… why, exactly?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Who knows, maybe for protection? British authorities we’re closing in on ‘em.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Sure. Maybe he helped them disappear? I mean, the guy clearly had a knack for hiding things.

Speaker: Nate
Text: And… go!

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: And… no.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Ah, it was a valiant effort.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Let’s go check out that tower.

Speaker: Sam
Text: I’ll come with. It’s in pretty good shape for something several hundred years old.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah. They’re definitely ruins from Avery’s era. Sam, look.

Speaker: Sam
Text: That’s Christopher Condent’s sigil. Captain of the Fiery Dragon. Operated out of Madagascar around Avery’s time. So… maybe Avery recruits pirate captains… to what, be his lookouts? That don’t make any sense.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Huh… bark’s stripped away. Something was wrapped around this tree.  Hey, did you know our car came with a winch?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: No, really? I didn’t know. Whatcha gonna do with it?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Not sure yet.  There. That oughta do it.  Whoo… whoa… whoa…

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Well, that looked like fun.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Steeper than it looks. All right, ready?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Give it a shot.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Here we go. Steady…  You see, Sully? Winch. Totally worth it.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: We cleared a hill. It hasn’t exactly paid for itself.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, not yet. Small victories.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah, well, I’ll celebrate the big ones.

Speaker: Nate
Text: I just gotta put the winch back and we’ll be on our way.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Feast your eyes, gentlemen.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Wow.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Spectacular.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Just imagine… you’ve come here, a well-to-do pirate, far away from your oppressive government.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Poor, oppressed pirates. All they wanted to do was to murder and pillage in peace.

Speaker: Sam
Text: No, no. They wanted to live as free man.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well… if you’re gonna pick a place to run away from society, you could do a lot worse that here.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: It’s taking forever to get to this volcano.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Patience, Victor. Patience. Do you know how those pirates got here? They had to start in England, sail to Brazil, then cut back across the Atlantic to South Africa…

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Sam--

Speaker: Sam
Text: And they figured all that out with paper, charts, and by looking at the stars.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Hey. You’re describing sailing to a former squid.

Speaker: Sam
Text: The point is, we got it pretty easy.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah? Well… still taking a long time.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Hahahahaha!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Sorry, sorry… Good car, don’t die… don’t die on me.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Hey, Nathan, cheek out that cave there.

Speaker: Nate
Text: I’ll be right back.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Hey, you see something?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Let’s roll.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: This thing come with airbags? Or parachutes?  Oh, shit! Stop, stop!

Speaker: Nate
Text: I see ‘em. Here…

Speaker: Sam
Text: What do we got?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Military types, poking around.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Nadine’s guys?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yep.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Son of a bitch.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Looks like they found an old colony outpost.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: But the wrong one, right?

Speaker: Nate
Text: That’s the good news.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: That means there’s bad news.

Speaker: Nate
Text: The only route to the volcano is straight through them.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Well, shit. We do have the drop on ‘em.

Speaker: Sam
Text: What’s the play here, Nathan?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Just follow my lead.

Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Howzit – you have that dinges hooked up yet?

Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: We’re still set up just waiting on approval from Nadine to blow it.

Speaker: Mercenary 1
Text: Good. Place looks empty. I’d like to get it over with and move on.

Speaker: Mercenary 2
Text: Let’s go, gentlemen! It’s gonna be a hot, long day and we have lots to do. If those Drake boys show heir pretty faces, you all know what to do!

Speaker: Mercenary 3
Text: I serve ‘em right, too. Just hope I bag ‘em first.

Speaker: Mercenary 4
Text: Ha. Your shaky hands couldn’t do anything ‘til they get in bludgeoning distance. I’m afraid it’ll be my honor.

Speaker: Mercenary 3
Text: Up for a wager on it. For the usual amount?

Speaker: Mercenary 4
Text: Oh, you re on.

Speaker: Mercenary 5
Text: I got one!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, this should be fun!

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Nate, sniper!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Uh, oh, no, no, no, no.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Got ‘em! They’re on your left!

Speaker: Sam
Text: Saw that. Good one!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Okay… I think that’s it.

Speaker: Sam
Text: God damn it… Rafe and Nadine must have dozens of guys out here. They could just stumble of to the treasure through blind luck…

Speaker: Nate
Text: Oh, crap.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Jesus, these pirates really need to work on their infrastructure.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Now how do we get outta here?

Speaker: Sam
Text: C’mon, c’mon!

Speaker: Nate
Text: Again with the winch, Sully. Pretty handy, right?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: I wasn’t against getting the winch, I was against getting ripped off.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Easy…

Speaker: Nate
Text: Sully, just how well do you know Nadine?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Why…?

Speaker: Nate
Text: I was thinking, maybe you can contact her, convince her to call off her goons.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Yeah, right.

Speaker: Nate
Text: What if we promise her a bigger cut than Rafe?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: No, that’s not how she operates. She’s more a money-up-front kind of mercenary. So Rafe’s got the advantage there.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Look. Shoreline.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Yeah. They‘re definitely going all in, aren’t they?

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: And get getting awful close to that volcano.

Speaker: Sam
Text: I was thinking the same damn thing. What if they found the treasure already?

Speaker: Nate
Text: Well, look, they’re searching every inch of this place, if they’d found it already, they wouldn’t be searching.

Speaker: Sam
Text: Yeah… yeah, you’re right.

Speaker: Sullivan
Text: Hey Sam. If you don’t mind me asking, how’d you pass the time in prison?

Speaker: Sam
Text: Well, well, well.  Get it? You know, ‘cause it’s a well.

Speaker: Nate
Text: Sully, he stole your joke.

Speaker: Sullivan
